career.name: Junior Full Stack Developer
career.title: Creaxon, Inc
description: Developed and maintained frontend components and full pages for 10+ websites using ReactJS, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, Material UI, and vanilla CSS.
Built and customized WordPress and Shopify websites—handled page builders (Elementor, WPBakery), theme customization, plugin setup, and storefront enhancements to meet diverse client needs.
Designed and translated Figma UI/UX mockups into modern, responsive, and accessible web interfaces, ensuring consistency across devices.
Refactored and enhanced legacy codebases to boost scalability, readability, and performance using modular development practices.
Integrated Google Analytics to provide clients (including Australian-based businesses) with performance insights and user behavior tracking.
Optimized websites for SEO through semantic structure improvements, meta tag tuning, and performance enhancements.
Used Strapi CMS for managing blog content and product listings, enabling clients to update content without developer support.
Implemented security features such as CAPTCHA on WordPress forms to reduce spam and enhance trust.
Created a custom email API using Node.js and Nodemailer to automate communication processes.
Built automation scripts for scraping structured data from third-party sources, reducing manual data collection time.
Deployed websites using Cloudways—managed servers, SSH sessions, and file transfers via PuTTY and SFTP.
Performed routine website checks, bug fixes, and maintenance to ensure high uptime and smooth performance.
Collaborated using GitLab—handled version control, branch management, and merge requests across teams.
Ensured all UI implementations followed modern design trends and maintained consistency and responsiveness across platforms.

career.name: Full Stack Web Developer & Project Manager
career.title: Freelance / Project-based
description: Led full-stack development for multiple client projects—managed project timelines, deliverables, and progress tracking to ensure timely launches.
Supervised and guided a small team of developers—conducted code reviews, offered mentorship, and enforced clean, scalable coding standards.
Collaborated directly with clients to gather technical and business requirements, turning ideas into clear development plans and solutions.
Built responsive and accessible user interfaces for 10+ websites using React and Tailwind CSS, ensuring performance and cross-device compatibility.
Integrated third-party and custom APIs to enable dynamic functionality and seamless data flow across applications.
Implemented authentication, real-time data handling, and cloud database workflows using Supabase and Node.js.
Configured CI/CD workflows using GitHub and Vercel—enabled automatic builds and deployments on every code push for faster development cycles.
Maintained clean and collaborative Git workflows—managed branches, conducted code reviews, and merged pull requests following best practices.

career.name: Lead Programmer - Intern
career.title: Library - CvSU - CCAT Campus
description: Built and led the end-to-end development of a Python-based desktop application that monitored library PC usage, automated session tracking, and generated real-time usage reports—significantly improving administrative efficiency.
Designed and implemented the system's UI using PySimpleGUI, ensuring a user-friendly interface tailored for non-technical staff.
Integrated MS Excel for seamless data storage and report exports, reducing manual data entry and improving record accuracy.
Collaborated with library staff to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications, ensuring the solution addressed actual workflow needs.
Provided ongoing software and hardware support, troubleshooting system issues, optimizing device performance, and assisting with daily front-desk tasks and user onboarding.
